inclusion.criterion: Premenopausal women must be surgically sterilized or be on oral contraceptive therapy
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Patients have familial hypercholesterolemia and have undergone at least 6 months optimal diet and drug therapy and fit group A, B, or C
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Disorders associated with excessive bleeding (e.g., peptic ulcer and hemophilia)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of CAD s/p CABG, EF 60% prior CVA (no residual deficits), HTN, HL, DMII, Moderate to Severe PVD. He reports occasional dizziness and no prior syncope or sensory/motor defects.
